thread.title: Very happy customer (Dublin)
thread.title_full: MemoryC.com reviewed by Very happy customer (Dublin)

author: Very happy customer (Dublin)
title: Very happy customer (Dublin)
text: I urgently needed Arctic Silver thermal paste (3.5 g is more than enough for several years of maintenance: no need to buy more!) to repair my laptop and this has been much quicker than searching on brick & mortar shops, that offer something worse and pricey. Paying the shipping fee was cheaper than taking the bus to their shop. Service was excellent and even if there was no tracking info, they have notified me at each step of the process. Will buy from them again for sure!
